original_text: All the days of his separation he shall eat nothing that is produced by the grapevine, not even the seeds or the skins.
korean_text: 자기 몸을 구별하는 모든 날 동안에는 포도나무 소산은 씨나 껍질이라도 먹지 말지며

sentences.original_text: All the days of his separation
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신을 구별하는 모든 날 동안에는

sentences.original_text: he shall eat nothing that is produced by the grapevine
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 포도나무에서 난 것은 무엇이든 먹지 말아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: not even the seeds or the skins
